Poetic Translation: Angelic beauty's come to make earth more fair.
So all for whom it's more than just a duty

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: To seek for virtue's charm, come and be near it.

Lyrics: Vengha veder costei che sol vagheça,
Poetic Translation: Come savor only grace, come see her beauty

Lyrics: Arà di lei si com’à l’alma mia
Poetic Translation: Just as was seen and felt by my own spirit.

Lyrics: Ma non credo con pace tanta guerra.
Poetic Translation: I don't believe that peace can come from warfare.
Angelic beauty's come to make earth more fair.
